content:
Craft an item of type: golden_boots
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 18, "index": 35}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft golden boots, I need to place 3 gold ingots in a v shape in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the gold ingots from slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: golden_boots
inventory=[{"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 18, "index": 35}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}]
thought: The second gold ingot needs to be placed below the first one, so I will move it to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: golden_boots
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 18, "index": 35}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}]
thought: The third gold ingot needs to be placed to the left of the second one, so I will move it to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: golden_boots
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 18, "index": 35}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}]
thought: The fourth gold ingot needs to be placed to the right of the second one, so I will move it to slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 6 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: golden_boots
inventory=[{"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 18, "index": 35}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that the golden boots have been crafted, I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
